name: FireworksSounds
0:
”Alexa open Fireworks Sounds”
”Alexa ask Fireworks Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fireworks sounds
des:
Ignite your senses with Fireworks Sounds. Experience the magic of fireworks any time. Immerse yourself in a captivating audio journey that brings the exhilaration of a grand fireworks display right into your home. Perfect for setting the ambiance for celebrations, providing a backdrop for imaginative play, or simply enjoying a moment of awe-inspiring sounds.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Fireworks Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
